name: Corpse of the World
description:
The man-made island city of New Manifest sits 16 miles off the East Coast of the United States. A miracle of science, the city is filled with millions of people who sought a fresh start in a new place full of opportunity. Then the dead began to rise, the people began to change, and those left alive found themselves left to survive off the ruins of their former lives.

A TTRPG of survival and resource management using 2d6, Corpse of the World will test your ability to scrounge the ruins of a massive city full of danger around every corner. Featuring quick and easy character generation as well as numerous tables for quick encounter and loot generation. Think fast, move quiet, and you may just survive long enough to find the answers you've been searching for.
